page.title: 12HOUSE SURVEY NE. PLYMOUTH
page.content: {ESTOVER: }33 CHILDREN LIVE IN A BUILT UP AREA.MOSTLY TERRACED AND BUILT ON THE VALLEY SIDE.THE HOUSES DO NOT HAVE MORE THAN 3 BEDROOMS AND VERY SMALL GARDENS CLOSE TOGETHER.{CROWNHILL: } MOSTLY TERRACED WITH SOME FLATS AND BUNGALOWS.ALL ARE QUITE BIG IN SIZE.MOST HOUSES HAVE 3 BEDROOMS. {MAINSTONE:}HOUSES ARE SELF BUILT.THEY HAVE THE BIGGEST HOUSES AND GARDENS. THEY ALL HAVE GARAGES WITH DRIVES. 1 HOUSE HAS GOT AN OUTSIDE SWIMMING POOL,SOME HAVE BASEMENTS.{SERVICES:} WE HAVE COLD WATER FOR THE BATHROOM AND KITCHEN.WE HAVE GAS OR ELECTRICITY IN OUR KITCHEN.WE HAVE GAS OR ELECTRICITY TO HEAT OUR WATER.WE HAVE PLUGS IN ALMOST EVERY ROOM FOR OUR ELECTRICAL GADGETS.OUR CENTRAL HEATING IS RUN BY{GAS,ELECTRICITY,OIL }OR { {COAL.}MOTHER,FATHER AND CHILDREN LIVE IN ONE HOUSE USUALLY.
